question: How do I reset my password?
answer: Go to Settings > Account > Reset Password and follow the steps. You will receive a confirmation link by email.

question: How do I change my email address?
answer: Navigate to Settings > Profile, update your email, and confirm via the verification link sent to your new address.

question: Can I upgrade my subscription plan?
answer: Yes. Go to Billing > Plans and select the new plan. The change takes effect immediately and your bill is prorated.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: Open Billing > Subscriptions and click 'Cancel'. You will retain access until the end of your billing cycle.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept credit cards, PayPal, and wire transfers for annual enterprise plans.

question: Where can I download my invoices?
answer: Invoices are available under Billing > Invoices. You can download them in PDF format.

question: What is your refund policy?
answer: Refunds are available within 30 days of purchase for annual subscriptions. Contact support@example.com for assistance.

question: Is my data secure?
answer: Yes. We use encryption in transit (TLS 1.2+) and at rest (AES-256). Access is restricted and audited regularly.

question: Do you offer customer support?
answer: Yes. Standard plans include email support. Pro and Enterprise plans also include live chat and phone support.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can contact us via support@example.com or through the Helpdesk in your dashboard.

question: Does the product have mobile apps?
answer: Yes. We offer both iOS and Android apps, available on the App Store and Google Play.

question: Can I integrate with Slack or Teams?
answer: Yes. Go to Settings > Integrations and connect Slack or Microsoft Teams.

question: How do I set up two-factor authentication (2FA)?
answer: Go to Settings > Security and enable 2FA. You can use authenticator apps like Google Authenticator or Authy.

question: Do you provide training materials?
answer: Yes. We provide onboarding guides, a knowledge base, and video tutorials accessible from the Help Center.

question: Is there an API available?
answer: Yes. API documentation is available at https://api.example.com/docs. API keys can be generated under Developer Settings.

question: Can I export my data?
answer: Yes. Use the Export tool under Settings > Data Export. Exports are available in CSV and JSON formats.

question: How many users are included in my plan?
answer: Starter includes 5 users, Pro includes 25 users, and Enterprise is unlimited.

question: Do you offer discounts for non-profits or education?
answer: Yes. Please contact sales@example.com with proof of eligibility.

question: Why am I being charged tax?
answer: Taxes are applied according to your billing country and local regulations.

question: Can I schedule a product demo?
answer: Yes. Visit our website at example.com/demo to schedule a live demo with our team.
